DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate DAILIES TOTAL1 ® Multifocal ( DTl MF ) contact lenses current multifocal contact lens wearer symptom end day discomfort compare habitual multifocal contact lens correction .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Assessment DAILIES TOTAL1® ( DT1 ) Multifocal
DOC.criteria: Must sign inform consent document ; Current daily wearer soft multifocal contact lenses least 6 month symptom contact lens discomfort define prescreening Eligibility Questionnaire ; Requires near spectacle add +0.50 +2.50 diopter ( D ) ( inclusive ) ; Requires lens within power range study lenses fit ; Best correct VA ( BCVA ) 20/30 ( 0.2 logarithmic minimum angle resolution [ logMAR ] ) good eye distance ; Willing wear study lenses minimum 5 day per week , 6 hour per day , attend study visit ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Any eye condition contraindicate wear contact lens determine Investigator ; Any use medication contact lens wear could contraindicate , determined Investigator ; Monocular ( one eye functional ) fit 1 lens ; Fitted monovision ; Prior refractive surgery ( e.g. , laser vision correction , photorefractive keratectomy , etc . ) ; History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery , irregular cornea ; Currently wear DT1 MF contact lens ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
